ygData.subject: RE: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t gone online in a few weeks - but what?  When did this happen?  I don t remember them saying any of this in the eqnews - If this is the case, some of
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't gone online in a few weeks - but what? When did this happen? I
don't remember them saying any of this in the eqnews - If this is the case,
some of the monks wonderful versatility has been greatly reduced.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 12:23 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


I am suprised it hasn't started already. I just wanted to share with you my
Post nerf FD experimentaion.

Sol A green Flame goblins. the goblins I was experimenting with were on the
floor near the passage to where the Foreman spawns. I succesfully feigned
them at this point. they returned to thier spawn points . I stood up they
immediatly came back. so I feign again they return to thier points I get up
and run all the way to the small bridge type thing near the sol b spawn
point. I fd again. I was several mins stand up wait a few and here they
come a running at me. I fd again let them walk away. get up and they come
back.

A fellow monk on my server experimented in Lguk with some Dar Undead frogs
and had similar results even after 5 mins of feign time.


any other people doing experimentation out there?


Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 45th .....
E-Marr
Da`Kor
